title: CMD.exe - 64-bit maths
body: The calculations limitation to +/-2**31 can cause problems, so extension to 64-bit would be appreciated. There should be a switch

comments.body:
I think such switch is worthless... 64-bit support can be used either 32-bit and 64-bit apps, except that above 32-bit limits, the 32-bit designed script might not get an error, but who needs such error?
Voted for 64-bit support.
